Analyzes all the media files in the libr: Analyzes all the media files in the library section. The analysis captures information about the media which helps Plex decide how to optimally play back the media.
Cleans up the library database and ensur: Cleans up the library database and ensures it is operating as quickly as possible. This is especially useful when you've added or removed a large amount of media from the library.
利用可能な共有ライブラリはありません。
The media server stores information abou: The media server stores information about your media to disk, as well as posters, artwork, and other media resources from the Internet. Running this task deletes any bundles which are no longer in use.
Plex organizes your library into section: Plex organizes your library into sections, organized by type. You can add as many sections as you want, and you can have multiple sections with the same type.
Removes a library section and all items: Removes a library section and all items inside. It does not delete any media files. View progress and ratings are preserved, in case any of the items are added in the future.

Name: 名前
Forces a download of fresh media informa: Forces a download of fresh media information from the Internet. This can take a long time. Any locked fields are not modified.

By default the media server doesn't remo: By default the media server doesn't remove information for media right away. This helps if a drive is temporarily disconnected. When you empty the trash for a section, all information about missing media is deleted.

Plex channels give you access to online: Plex channels give you access to online media from a variety of sites. You can browse and install these channels from the Channel Directory, but get started by installing some featured channels.

Plex was unable to sign your server in t: Plex was unable to sign your server in to myPlex. Ensure that the server computer or device can access the internet.
You will not be able to stream media fro: You will not be able to stream media from outside your home network until this is resolved.

A problem has been detected with a core: A problem has been detected with a core component of Plex. Please visit the forums and provide your logs, as described here.
Channels may require plugins to be insta: Channels may require plugins to be installed alongside the media server. Click on the links below to download the installer for each plugin.

A panel will appear on the left side of: A panel will appear on the left side of the page to let you know the video has been saved.
Or send videos to your queue by email: Or send videos to your queue by email
Every link that you email to this addres: Every link that you email to this address will be added to your myPlex queue. Add it to your address book so you can easily email links from your iPhone, iPad, Android, or any other device.

Let's start by giving your Plex server a: Let's start by giving your Plex server a friendly name so it can identify itself to other computers on the network. If you leave it blank, your computer name will be used.
Would you like to help us make Plex bett: Would you like to help us make Plex better for everyone? We collect anonymous data, which we use to improve the service over time.
If you would like to receive announcemen: If you would like to receive announcements about Plex, please enter your email address below. Don't worry, we won't send you spam.
Sign in with a myPlex account to help yo: Sign in with a myPlex account to help your devices find each other, access your media from anywhere, and queue up videos from your browser to watch later in Plex.
Connecting your server to myPlex allows: Connecting your server to myPlex allows you to stream media outside your home network, and can help your devices find each other.
See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this: See, that wasn't too bad, right? At this very moment, Plex is working tirelessly to build your library, and make it look beautiful. Like, there are at least a dozen mice on spinny wheels inside your computer, all peddling furiously.
Feel free to watch Plex work, or take th: Feel free to watch Plex work, or take this opportunity to download some Plex apps!

While Plex Media Server will automatical: While Plex Media Server will automatically download updates for Plex/Web periodically, use "Check for Updates" to manually download updates.

Help us translate Plex/Web into your lan: Help us translate Plex/Web into your language here.
When multiple resolutions are available: When multiple resolutions are available for a video, automatically use the highest possible resolution.

Populates the allowed networks setting w: Populates the allowed networks setting with 127.0.0.1/255.255.255.255. This requires other computers on a local network to authenticate with myPlex before accessing the server.
Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding aud: Prefer AAC over MP3 when transcoding audio. Some devices, like the Wii U, only support HLS with AAC audio.
This name will be used to identify this: This name will be used to identify this media server to other computers on your network. If you leave it blank, your computer's name will be used instead.
Send anonymous usage data to Plex: Send anonymous usage data to Plex
This helps us improve your experience (f: This helps us improve your experience (for example, to help us match movies and TV shows).
Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging: Enable Plex Media Server verbose logging
Ask to add a login item for externally m: Ask to add a login item for externally mounted drives
Enable Plex Media Server debug logging: Enable Plex Media Server debug logging
Your library will be updated automatical: Your library will be updated automatically when changes to library folders are detected
Weeks to look at for On Deck: Weeks to look at for On Deck
The number of recent weeks used as the w: The number of recent weeks used as the window for On Deck
Clients will be able to delete media: Clients will be able to delete media
Empty trash automatically after every sc: Empty trash automatically after every scan
Include music sections in automatic upda: Include music sections in automatic updates
Large music sections may take a long tim: Large music sections may take a long time to scan
Number of seconds to wait before a plugi: Number of seconds to wait before a plugin times out
Capability checking ensures that plug-in: Capability checking ensures that plug-ins that are incompatible with this version of the server or the current client application you are using are hidden. Disabling capability checking is useful during development, but will enable access to plug-ins that may perform unreliably with certain client applications.
List of networks that are allowed withou: List of networks that are allowed without auth
Comma separated list of ip/netmask for n: Comma separated list of ip/netmask for networks that are allowed into PMS without auth
Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes: Timeout in seconds segmented transcodes wait for the transcoder to begin writing data
Duration in minutes to use when transcod: Duration in minutes to use when transcoding something with an unknown duration
Directory to use when transcoding for te: Directory to use when transcoding for temporary files
Amount in seconds to buffer before throt: Amount in seconds to buffer before throttling the transcoder
Show the WebKit window used by plugins i: Show the WebKit window used by plugins instead of placing it off screen
Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS aud: Enable Media Link down-mixing of DTS audio.
Media Link does not support DTS audio in: Media Link does not support DTS audio in certain regions. The Plex Media Server can automatically convert DTS to stereo so that it will play.
Automatically select audio tracks in you: Automatically select audio tracks in your preferred language when possible.
Client-specific configuration settings f: Client-specific configuration settings for the DLNA server
Protocol info string used in GetProtocol: Protocol info string used in GetProtocolInfo responses by the DLNA server
Number of seconds between DLNA media ren: Number of seconds between DLNA media renderer discovery requests
Enable the PMS DLNA server to report tim: Enable the PMS DLNA server to report timelines for video play activity

Sorry, you need a <a href='{1}' target=': Sorry, you need a PlexPass subscription for this feature.
Sorry, you need a PlexPass subscription: Sorry, you need a PlexPass subscription to save some of these settings.
Allows the player to play compatible med: Allows the player to play compatible media without any conversion. In most browsers, direct play supports MP4 videos with h264 video and AAC audio. Videos with subtitles cannot be played directly.
Allows the server to copy compatible aud: Allows the server to copy compatible audio and video streams without converting them.
At least one folder is required.

Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be pl: Allow MP4 videos with AC3 audio to be played directly. Browser support for AC3 audio is limited.

Playback of this track is not supported.
Plugins need to be installed on the comp: Plugins need to be installed on the computer that is running the media server.
Connecting your server makes it automati: Connecting your server makes it automatically available on your devices without any configuration of your router.
